definition: to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
bring it on!/give me all you got!
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: to make mincemeat of sb/to hack sb to pieces (used while cursing)
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
(dialect) to come to blows/to have a row
